title: Weather CLI
description: Get real-time weather forecasts using wttr.in CLI — plain text, JSON, or graphical output for any location
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: get_forecast
commands.description: Get a weather forecast for a location. Returns structured JSON with current conditions and 3-day forecast.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: City name, airport code, or coordinates (e.g. 'Philadelphia', 'JFK', '40.7,-74.0')

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format: 'json' for structured data, 'text' for plain text, 'oneline' for a single summary line

returns.description: Weather data with current conditions (temp, humidity, wind, description) and daily forecasts with min/max temp, precipitation chance, and hourly breakdowns

commands.name: get_current
commands.description: Get current weather conditions only (no forecast). Fast, single-line response.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: City name, airport code, or coordinates

returns.description: Single-line current weather summary, e.g. '☀️ +42°F Philadelphia, United States'

commands.name: get_moon_phase
commands.description: Get current moon phase information for a location

returns.description: ASCII art moon phase with phase name and illumination percentage
